channel.title: Account managment system
channel.description:
http://rapidshare.com/files/157088702/AMS.zip
I wrote this out of boredom / to familiarize myself with Swing. Turned out to be a rather OKish first project. It probably won't work with you server and if you have no idea what the fuck you're doing, don't download this.
To get it working, you basically have to either rename the table names in the script, or in your database.
Mostly posting this as a reference on how to bypass some of the problems I had, but I wouldn't suggest starting to learn Swing with this. It's horrible code that I never finished/cleaned-up/optimized. It's basically a very rough sketch.

item.title: Account managment system
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

good stuff. too bad i wont need to use it
